original: Jñānāmṛtasāra-Saṃhitā (also called "

original: Nārada-Pañcarātra")

original: śrī-nārada-pañca-rātram

original: prathamaika-rātre prathamo 'dhyāyaḥ

original: oṃ namo bhagavate vāsudevāya

original: kumārādyāś ca munayaḥ siddhāś ca kapilādayaḥ // Jss_1,1.1 //
analyzed: kumāra ādyāḥ ca munayaḥ siddhāḥ ca kapila ādayaḥ

original: vedebhyo dadhi-sindhubhyaś caturbhyaḥ sumanoharam /

original: taj jñāna-mantha-daṇḍena saṃnirmathya navaṃ navam // Jss_1,1.10 //
analyzed: tat jñāna mantha daṇḍena saṃnirmathya navam navam

original: oṃ nārāyaṇāśrame puṇye puṇya-kṣetre ca bhārata /

original: siddhe nārāyaṇa-kṣetre vaṭa-mūle supuṇyade // Jss_1,1.12 //
analyzed: siddhe nārāyaṇa kṣetre vaṭa mūle su puṇya de

śrī-kṛṣṇa-caraṇāmbhoja-dhyānaikatāna-mānasam // Jss_1,1.13 //
japantaṃ paramaṃ brahma kṛṣṇa ity akṣara-dvayam /

original: śrī-śuka uvāca
analyzed: śrī śukaḥ uvāca

original: yad yat prakāraṃ jñānaṃ ca nigūḍhaṃ śruti-sammatam // Jss_1,1.16 //
analyzed: yat yat prakāram jñānam ca nigūḍham śruti sammatam

analyzed: bhaktānām vāñcchitam vastu sāra bhūtam śrutau śrutam

atha pañca-rātra-pada-vyākhyā
analyzed: atha pañcarātra pada vyākhyā

analyzed: sarva svam yoginām putra siddhānām ca sukha pradam

original: aṇimā laghimā vyāptiḥ prākāmyaṃ mahimā tathā /

analyzed: īśitvam ca vaśitvam ca tathā kāmāvasāyi tā

analyzed: sa avajñam dūra śravaṇam parakāyapraveśanam

sarga-kartṛtva-śilpaṃ ca sarga-saṃhāra-kāraṇam /
analyzed: sarga kartṛ tva śilpam ca sarga saṃhāra kāraṇam

analyzed: jñānam ca paramam proktam tat vai vaiṣayikam

original: yad iṣṭa-devī māyā sā paraṃ saṃmoha-kāraṇaṃ // Jss_1,1.52 //
analyzed: yat iṣṭa devī māyā sā param saṃmoha kāraṇam

original: viṣaye baddha-citaṃ ca sarvam indriya-sevanam /

original: poṣanaṃ sva-kuṭumbānāṃ svātmanaś ca niranratam // Jss_1,1.53 //
analyzed: poṣanam sva kuṭumbānām sva ātmanaḥ ca

original: prathamaṃ sāttvikaṃ jñānaṃ dvitīyaṃ ca tad eva ca /
analyzed: prathamam sāttvikam jñānam dvitīyam ca tat eva ca

original: nairguṇyaṃ ca tṛtīyaṃ ca jñānaṃ ca sarvataḥ param // Jss_1,1.54 //
analyzed: nairguṇyam ca tṛtīyam ca jñānam ca sarvatas param

original: caturtham ca rājasikaṃ bhaktas tan nābhivāñcchati /

original: puṃsām aṣṭa-guṇaṃ kāmaṃ labhasva ca pṛthak prṛthak // Jss_1,14.110 //
analyzed: puṃsām aṣṭaguṇam kāmam labhasva ca pṛthak prṛthak

original: lajjāṃ catur-guṇāṃ cāpi dviguṇāṃ dhairyatāṃ tathā /
analyzed: lajjām caturguṇām ca api dviguṇām dhairya tām tathā

original: abhogecchadhame gaccha dūraṃ gaccha mamāntikāt // Jss_1,14.111 //
analyzed: abhoga iccha dhame gaccha dūram gaccha mama antikāt

original: puṃsāṃ ca dvi-guṇaḥ kāmo vāstavīṇāṃ ca yoṣitām /
analyzed: puṃsām ca dviguṇaḥ kāmaḥ vāstavīṇām ca yoṣitām

original: lajjā cāṣṭa-guṇā cāpi dhairyatā ca catur-guṇā // Jss_1,14.112 //
analyzed: lajjā ca aṣṭaguṇā ca api dhairya tā ca caturguṇā

original: kula-dharmaḥ kula-bhayaṃ sauśīlyaṃ mānam ūrjitam /
analyzed: kula dharmaḥ kula bhayam sauśīlyam mānam ūrjitam

original: śaśvat tiṣṭhatu puṃsy eva strīṣu ca mamājñayā // Jss_1,14.113 //
analyzed: śaśvat tiṣṭhatu puṃsi eva strīṣu ca mama ājñayā

original: yasmāt sadasi sarvebhyo lajjā-hīnaḥ surādhamaḥ /
analyzed: yasmāt sadasi sarvebhyaḥ lajjā hīnaḥ sura adhamaḥ

original: strī-sva-bhāvaṃ ca papraccha yajña-bhāk na bhavet tataḥ // Jss_1,14.114 //
analyzed: strī svabhāvam ca papraccha yajña bhāj na bhavet tatas

original: adya-prabhṛti viśveṣu nāgrāhyaṃ pāpa-saṃyutam /
analyzed: adya prabhṛti viśveṣu na agrāhyam pāpa saṃyutam

original: cikitsakānāṃ viduṣāṃ na bhakṣya mamājñayā // Jss_1,14.115 //
analyzed: cikitsakānām viduṣām na bhakṣya mama ājñayā

original: ity evam uktvā prayayur devyaś ca sarva-yoṣitaḥ /
analyzed: iti evam uktvā prayayuḥ devyaḥ ca sarva yoṣitaḥ

original: devāś ca munayaś cāpi ye cānye ca samāgataḥ // Jss_1,14.116 //
analyzed: devāḥ ca munayaḥ ca api ye ca anye ca samāgataḥ

original: devāś ca munayaś cāpi ye cānye sarvataḥ suta /
analyzed: devāḥ ca munayaḥ ca api ye ca anye sarvatas suta

original: pati-vratāṇāṃ strīṇāṃ ca lajjā bīja-svarūpiṇī // Jss_1,14.117 //
analyzed: pativratāṇām strīṇām ca lajjā bīja svarūpiṇī

original: iti śrī-nārada-pañca-rātre jñāṇāmṛta-sāre prathamaika-rātre
analyzed: iti śrī nāradapañcarātre jñāṇāmṛtasāre prathama ekarātre

original: kulaṭottpatir nāma caturdaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: kulaṭottpatiḥ nāma caturdaśaḥ adhyāyaḥ

original: prathamaika-rātre pañcadaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: prathama ekarātre pañcadaśaḥ adhyāyaḥ

original: gate niyamite kāle gandharvaś copavarhaṇaḥ /
analyzed: gate niyamite kāle gandharvaḥ ca upavarhaṇaḥ

original: sva-yogena jahau dehaṃ bhārate prāktanād aho // Jss_1,15.1 //
analyzed: sva yogena jahau deham bhārate prāktanāt aho

original: sa jajñe śudra-yonau ca pituḥ śāpena ca daivataḥ /
analyzed: sa jajñe śudra yonau ca pituḥ śāpena ca daivataḥ

original: viṣṇu-prasādaṃ bhuktvā ca babhūva brahmaṇaḥ sutaḥ // Jss_1,15.2 //
analyzed: viṣṇu prasādam bhuktvā ca babhūva brahmaṇaḥ sutaḥ

original: vimuktas tāta-śāpena samprāpya jñānam uttamam /
analyzed: vimuktaḥ tāta śāpena samprāpya jñānam uttamam

original: prati-janma-smṛtis tasya kṛṣṇa-mantra-prasādataḥ // Jss_1,15.3 //
analyzed: pratijanma smṛtiḥ tasya kṛṣṇa mantra prasādataḥ

original: pituḥ sakāśād āgatya samprāpa candra-śekharāt /
analyzed: pituḥ sakāśāt āgatya samprāpa candraśekharāt

original: śrī-kṛṣṇa-mantram atulaṃ svarga-mandākinī-taṭe // Jss_1,15.4 //
analyzed: śrī kṛṣṇa mantram atulam svarga mandākinī taṭe

original: svarga-mandākinī-tīrād guruṇā śaṅkareṇa ca /
analyzed: svarga mandākinī tīrāt guruṇā śaṅkareṇa ca

original: sahitaḥ prayayau tūrṇaṃ pārvatī-sannidhānataḥ // Jss_1,15.5 //
analyzed: sahitaḥ prayayau tūrṇam pārvatī sannidhānataḥ

original: uvāsa tatra śambhuś ca nāradaś ca mahā-muniḥ /
analyzed: uvāsa tatra śambhuḥ ca nāradaḥ ca mahā muniḥ

original: pārvatī bhadra-kālī skando gaṇa-patiḥ svayam // Jss_1,15.6 //
analyzed: pārvatī bhadrakālī skandaḥ gaṇapatiḥ svayam

original: mahā-kālaś ca nandī ca vīra-bhadraḥ pratāpavān /
analyzed: mahākālaḥ ca nandī ca vīrabhadraḥ pratāpavān

original: siddhā maharṣayaś ca munayaḥ sankādayaḥ // Jss_1,15.7 //
analyzed: siddhāḥ mahā ṛṣayaḥ ca munayaḥ

original: yogīndrā jñāninaḥ sarve samūcuḥ śambhu-saṃsadi /
analyzed: yogi indrāḥ jñāninaḥ sarve samūcuḥ śambhu saṃsadi

original: yat stotraṃ kavacaṃ dhyānaṃ subhadrāya ca kānane // Jss_1,15.8 //
analyzed: yat stotram kavacam dhyānam subhadrāya ca kānane

original: nārāyaṇarṣi-bhagavān brāhmaṇāya dadau purā /
analyzed: nārāyaṇa ṛṣi bhagavān brāhmaṇāya dadau purā

original: pūjā-vidhānaṃ yad yac ca puraś-caraṇa-pūrvakam // Jss_1,15.9 //
analyzed: pūjā vidhānam yat yat ca puraścaraṇa pūrvakam

original: tad eva bhagavān śambhuḥ pradadau nāradāya ca /
analyzed: tat eva bhagavān śambhuḥ pradadau nāradāya ca

original: uvāca śambhuṃ devarṣir yogināṃ ca guror gurum /
analyzed: uvāca śambhum devarṣiḥ yoginām ca guroḥ gurum

original: pārvatī-sannidhau tatra nāradaś ca mahā-muniḥ // Jss_1,15.10 //
analyzed: pārvatī sannidhau tatra nāradaḥ ca mahā muniḥ

original: bhagavan sarva-dharma-jña sarva-jña sarva-kāraṇa /
analyzed: bhagavan sarva dharma jña sarvajña sarva kāraṇa

original: sad yat pṛṣṭaṃ mayā pūrvaṃ tan māṃ vyākhyātum arhasi // Jss_1,15.11 //
analyzed: sat yat pṛṣṭam mayā pūrvam tat mām vyākhyātum arhasi

original: yad yat pṛṣṭaṃ tvayā brahman pratyekaṃ ca krameṇa ca /
analyzed: yat yat pṛṣṭam tvayā brahman pratyekam ca krameṇa ca

original: punaḥ praśnaṃ kuru mune śṛṇvantu mat-sabhāsadaḥ // Jss_1,15.12 //
analyzed: punar praśnam kuru mune śṛṇvantu mad sabhāsadaḥ

original: ādhyātmikaṃ ca yaj jñānaṃ vedānāṃ sāram uttamam /
analyzed: ādhyātmikam ca yat jñānam vedānām sāram uttamam

original: jñānaṃ jñāniṣu sāraṃ yat kṛṣṇa-bhakti-pradaṃ śubhaṃ // Jss_1,15.13 //
analyzed: jñānam jñāniṣu sāram yat kṛṣṇa bhakti pradam śubham

original: nirvāṇa-muktidaṃ jñānaṃ karma-mūla-nikṛntanam /
analyzed: nirvāṇa mukti dam jñānam karma mūla nikṛntanam

original: tat-siddhi-yogān muktiś ca yoginām api vāñcchitam // Jss_1,15.14 //
analyzed: tad siddhi yogāt muktiḥ ca yoginām api vāñcchitam

original: saṃsāra-viṣayaṃ jñānaṃ śaśvat sammoha-veṣṭitam /
analyzed: saṃsāra viṣayam jñānam śaśvat sammoha veṣṭitam

original: āśramāṇāṃ samācāraṃ teṣāṃ dharma-pariṣkṛtam // Jss_1,15.15 //
analyzed: āśramāṇām samācāram teṣām dharma pariṣkṛtam

original: caturṇāṃ varṇanāṃ vidhānāṃ maheśvara /
analyzed: caturṇām varṇanām vidhānām maheśvara

original: bhikṣūṇāṃ vaiṣṇavānāṃ ca yatīnāṃ brahma-cāriṇām // Jss_1,15.16 //
analyzed: bhikṣūṇām vaiṣṇavānām ca yatīnām brahmacāriṇām

original: vāna-prasthāśramāṇāṃ ca paṇḍitānāṃ tathaiva ca /
analyzed: vānaprastha āśramāṇām ca paṇḍitānām tathā eva ca

original: pati-vratānāṃ yad yac ca śrī-kṛṣṇa-pūjanaṃ ca yat // Jss_1,15.17 //
analyzed: pativratānām yat yat ca śrī kṛṣṇa pūjanam ca yat

original: yat stotraṃ kavacaṃ mantraṃ puraś-caraṇam īpsitam /
analyzed: yat stotram kavacam mantram puraścaraṇam īpsitam

original: sārvāhnikam abhīṣṭaṃ ca vipākaṃ karma-jīvinām // Jss_1,15.18 //
analyzed: sārvāhnikam abhīṣṭam ca vipākam karma jīvinām

original: saṃsāra-vāsanā-baddhaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ prakṛtīśayoḥ /
analyzed: saṃsāra vāsanā baddham lakṣaṇam prakṛti īśayoḥ

original: tayoḥ paraṃ vā yad brahma tasyāvatāra-varṇanam // Jss_1,15.19 //
analyzed: tayoḥ param vā yat brahma tasya avatāra varṇanam

original: kas tat kalāvatīrṇaś ca kas tad-aṃśaś tathaiva ca /
analyzed: kaḥ tat kalā avatīrṇaḥ ca kaḥ tad aṃśaḥ tathā eva ca

original: paripūrṇatamaḥ kaś ca kaḥ pūrṇaḥ kaḥ kalāṃśakaḥ // Jss_1,15.20 //
analyzed: paripūrṇatamaḥ kaḥ ca kaḥ pūrṇaḥ kaḥ kalā aṃśakaḥ

original: kasya vārādhane śambho kiṃ phalaṃ kiṃ yaśas tathā /
analyzed: kasya vā ārādhane śambho kim phalam kim yaśaḥ tathā

original: aṅgāṅginor bheda-phalaṃ vistīrṇaṃ nirapekṣakam // Jss_1,15.21 //
analyzed: aṅga aṅginoḥ bheda phalam vistīrṇam nirapekṣakam

original: nārāyaṇarṣi-kavacaṃ subhadra-brāhmaṇāya ca /
analyzed: nārāyaṇa ṛṣi kavacam subhadra brāhmaṇāya ca

original: yad dattaṃ kiṃ tad deveśa tad-ārādhyaś ca kaḥ suraḥ // Jss_1,15.22 //
analyzed: yat dattam kim tat deveśa tad ārādhyaḥ ca kaḥ suraḥ

original: ati-saṃgopanīyaṃ ca kavacaṃ paramādbhutam /
analyzed: ati saṃgopanīyam ca kavacam parama adbhutam

original: sudurlabhaṃ ca viśveṣu noktaṃ māṃ brahmaṇā purā // Jss_1,15.23 //
analyzed: su durlabham ca viśveṣu na uktam mām brahmaṇā purā

original: sanat-kumāro jānāti noktaṃ tena purā ca mām /
analyzed: sanatkumāraḥ jānāti na uktam tena purā ca mām

original: mayā jñānam anāpṛṣṭaṃ yad yaj jānāsi maṅgalam // Jss_1,15.24 //
analyzed: mayā jñānam an āpṛṣṭam yat yat jānāsi maṅgalam

original: veda-sāram anupamaṃ karma-mūla-nikṛntanam /
analyzed: veda sāram anupamam karma mūla nikṛntanam

original: tan me kathaya bhadreśa mām evānugrahaṃ kuru // Jss_1,15.25 //
analyzed: tat me kathaya bhadra īśa mām eva anugraham kuru

original: apūrvaṃ rādhikākhyānaṃ vedeṣu ca sudurlabham /
analyzed: apūrvam rādhikā ākhyānam vedeṣu ca su durlabham

original: purāṇeṣv itihāse ca vedāṅgeṣu sudurlabham // Jss_1,15.26 //
analyzed: purāṇeṣu itihāse ca vedāṅgeṣu su durlabham

original: guroś ca jñānodigaraṇāt jñānaṃ syān mantra-tantrayoḥ /
analyzed: guroḥ ca jñāna udi garaṇāt jñānam syāt mantra tantrayoḥ

original: tat tantaṃ sa ca mantraḥ syāt kṛṣṇa-bhaktir yato bhavet // Jss_1,15.27 //
analyzed: tat tantam sa ca mantraḥ syāt kṛṣṇa bhaktiḥ yatas bhavet

original: jñānaṃ syād viduṣāṃ kiṃcid veda-vyākhyānataḥ prabho /
analyzed: jñānam syāt viduṣām kiṃcid veda vyākhyānataḥ prabho

original: veda-kāraṇa-pūjyaś tvaṃ jñānādhiṣṭhātṛ-devatā // Jss_1,15.28 //
analyzed: veda kāraṇa pūjyaḥ tvam jñāna adhiṣṭhātṛ devatā

original: tasmād bhavān paraṃ jñānaṃ vada veda-vidāṃ vara /
analyzed: tasmāt bhavān param jñānam vada veda vidām vara

original: māṃ bhaktam anuraktaṃ ca śaraṇāgatam īśvara // Jss_1,15.29 //
analyzed: mām bhaktam anuraktam ca śaraṇa āgatam īśvara

original: nāradasya vacaḥ śrutvā yogināṃ ca guror guruḥ /
analyzed: nāradasya vacaḥ śrutvā yoginām ca guroḥ guruḥ

original: bhagavatyā sahālocya jñānaṃ vaktuṃ samudyataḥ // Jss_1,15.30 //
analyzed: bhagavatyā saha ālocya jñānam vaktum samudyataḥ

original: ity evaṃ kathitaṃ sarvaṃ pūrvākhyānaṃ manoharam /
analyzed: iti evam kathitam sarvam pūrva ākhyānam manoharam

original: hari-bhakti-pradaṃ sarvaṃ karma-mūla-nikṛntanam // Jss_1,15.31 //
iti śrī-nārada-pañca-rātre jñānāmṛta-sāre
analyzed: iti śrī nāradapañcarātre jñāna amṛta sāre

original: prathamaika-rātre pañcadaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
analyzed: prathama ekarātre pañcadaśaḥ adhyāyaḥ

original: samāptaś cedaṃ nārada-pañca-rātraika-rātram
analyzed: samāptaḥ ca idam nāradapañcarātra eka rātram
